info.name: Nostrum - Torrentday
info.description: Some visual (and semantic) changes to Torrentday.com
info.additionalInfo:
! Effects are most notable in pages that require login

Features:
- Remove background
- Widden table
- Clearly mark visited links

=============================
Release notes
2015-02-04 Looks good in all "Browse Setup"s, i.e. "Awesome!",  "Fast!", & "Lame old Style"
2014-01-09 Fixed issues

data.title: doesn't work with animated browsing mode
